title: Get Bug || Failed to enter Join Multiplayer Game
body:
#### Expected behavior

I hope when joining in multiplayer game does not happen a problem

#### Actual behavior

The fact is when I ask to join always can not and this is an obstacle for me.Please repair

#### How to reproduce

* Download the freebloks app on playstore Or [Here](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=de.saschahlusiak.freebloks) * Launch App
* Touch to skip tutorial
* Then comes the "Host" and "Join" button
* Now please select Join button
* Fill in your name and select the "Internet" button
* Waiting for a moment to connect then the Notice appears failed - Device used: Samsung Grand prime SM-G530

* Operating System: Android version 4.4.4

* Application version: 1.0.5 #### Recording Of The Bug https://youtu.be/xY1AZfqwMds this is a proof of my Internet connection work https://youtu.be/6hzKiG8RuFA
Posted on Utopian.io - Rewarding Open Source Contributors

title: bug on  Freebloks 3D fullscreen botton
body:
#### Expected behavior I was expecting to see some differences when enable or unable Full screen #### Actual behavior When i un-enable full-screen there was no effect on the board or screen of the game #### How to reproduce 1.Download [Freebloks 3D](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=de.saschahlusiak.freebloks) 2.Launch 3.Click on the 3 dot at the upper right side of the screen 4.Click on Settings 5.On the list under Interface, Enable or unenable Full-screen Device Used: Tecno Droidpad 8ll Android Version: 5.1 App version:1.0.5 #### Recording Of The Bug https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Trxlh4hJY4M
Posted on Utopian.io - Rewarding Open Source Contributors

title: Bug on Freeblocks, Unable to paste tiles on the board
body:
#### Expected behavior The green square shows a place that is allowed to move the tiles to, with just a cube at the part of the moveable stones should be on the green, in other to release the tiles on the board. #### Actual behavior I was unable to drop one of the stones tiles on the provided green space on the board. #### How to reproduce 1. Download [Freebloks 3D](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=de.saschahlusiak.freebloks) 2. Play the game and make a space at the edge of the game board to have a greenish square and move a like wise stone too the greenish square. The video will help to understand more Device Used: Tecno Droidpad 8ll Android Version: 5.1 App Version: 1.0.5 #### Recording Of The Bug https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QXv8OOy16dE
Posted on Utopian.io - Rewarding Open Source Contributors

title: Add to F-Droid
body: It would be handy to have this app distributed through F-Droid. Do you think that would be feasible?

title: Can't start single player game, always shows "Connection refused"
body:
I don't understand. Do I need to be in the Wifi network in order to be able play it? I want to play the single player game, but the popup "Connection refused" keeps coming out. 

I'm on Android 4.4.2

title: App Hangs
body:
App hangs near end of game; when other players out of available moves.  The issue's intermittent; seems to work for the the second turn after all other players are out of moves), but often hangs after the second or third.

The game's menus continue to work, but the undo button is disabled, and the game itself is unresponsive.
You can successfully initiate a new game from the menu, "resolving" the issue (i.e. the board is no longer frozen; though the previous game is aborted).

Sometimes it's possible to also rotate the board (i.e. to see other player's remaining pieces).  On returning to your own board your pending pieces are no longer displayed.
Navigating to a different app then back again has a similar result to rotating the board full circle (i.e. your pieces are no longer displayed).

title: Gpgs
body:
This brings GPGS code up to speed to latest 5.0 release, commits are brought over from android-samples repository. Not much user facing changed.
While at it, I also fixed a whole bunch of offending whitespace.
I'd also love to get rid of binaries that haunt this repository, that's really not a good idea. Maybe if they were in a different repository…
